About Me

In case I dont see ya, good afternoon, good evening, and good night.

BIO

I have two degrees, Business and CS, but I am prepared and determined to be a professional developer.

I am a new grad with limited experience, but I am passionate, eager to learn and willing to take any challenges.

I have been exposed to many programming languages during my study, but I do not mind learn a new one.

I am a teamplayer, but I am not afraid of taking responsibilites and work individually.

I can prove my ability if I have the chance, no but for this line.

Software Developer Co-op @ Colligo

  •   Participated in the refinement of software requirements
  •   Wrote source code in C# to implement requirements
  •   Wrote unit tests in C# to prevent regression of existing feature set
  •   Participated in regular code review sessions
  •   Investigated and fix defects identified by the QA team

    • On top of the key duties, worked with Visual Studio, Git version control, and JIRA tickets frequently. Gained a better understanding of Agile and Test driven development.
